org.apache.flink.python.api.streaming.data

类 PythonStreamer<S extends PythonSender,OUT>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.flink.python.api.streaming.data.PythonStreamer<S,OUT>
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    java.io.Serializable
    直接已知子类:
    PythonDualInputStreamer, PythonSingleInputStreamer

    public class PythonStreamer<S extends PythonSender,OUT>
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    This streamer is used by functions to send/receive data to/from an external python process.
    另请参阅:

        public final void sendBroadCastVariables(Configuration config)

        抛出:
